divs: Sighting DetailsI was in the right place, at the right time. I was waiting for my wife to get the car. As I was bored I was looking up. I saw what at first I thought was a high flying jet. As I studied it I realized it was not a jet, but something eles. The object was silver in color, sort of eliptcal in shape, made no vapor trail, no noise, and was moving very fast. It was much faster than a jet. In a few seconds it was gone traveling from the north to the south.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Methuen
There were no other sightings in Methuen on or around June 9th 2009
